contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Słubice County | native_name = Powiat słubicki | settlement_type = [[Powiat|County]] | total_type = Total | image_flag = POL powiat słubicki flag.svg | image_shield = POL powiat słubicki COA.svg | image_map = Woj lubuskie powiat slubicki.svg | map_caption = Location within the voivodeship | coordinates_display = inline,title | coordinates_region = PL | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = {{POL}} | subdivision_type1 = [[Voivodeships of Poland|Voivodeship]] | subdivision_name1 = [[Lubusz Voivodeship|Lubusz]] | area_total_km2 = 999.77 | population_total = 46777| population_as_of = 2006 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_urban = 30135 | population_blank1_title = Rural | population_blank1 = 16642 | coor_pinpoint = Słubice | latd = 52 | latm = 21 | lats = | latNS = N | longd = 14 | longm = 34 | longs = | longEW = E | seat = [[Słubice]] | parts_type = [[Gmina]]s | parts = Total 5 | p1 = [[Gmina Cybinka]] | p2 = [[Gmina Górzyca]] | p3 = [[Gmina Ośno Lubuskie]] | p4 = [[Gmina Rzepin]] | p5 = [[Gmina Słubice, Lubusz Voivodeship|Gmina Słubice]] | blank_name = [[Polish car number plates|Car plates]] | blank_info = FSL | website = http://www.powiatslubicki.pl }} __NOTOC__ '''Słubice County''' ({{lang-pl|powiat słubicki}}) is a unit of territorial administration and local government ([[powiat]]) in [[Lubusz Voivodeship]], western [[Poland]], on the [[Germany|German]] border. It came into being on January 1, 1999, as a result of the [[Polish local government reforms]] passed in 1998. Its administrative seat and largest town is [[Słubice]], which lies {{convert|63|km|mi|0|abbr=on}} south-west of [[Gorzów Wielkopolski]] and {{convert|79|km|mi|0|abbr=on}} north-west of [[Zielona Góra]]. The county contains three other towns: [[Rzepin]], lying {{convert|19|km|mi|0|abbr=on}} east of Słubice, [[Ośno Lubuskie]], lying {{convert|25|km|mi|0|abbr=on}} north-east of Słubice, and [[Cybinka]], {{convert|24|km|mi|0|abbr=on}} south-east of Słubice. The county covers an area of {{convert|999.77|km2|sqmi|1}}. As of 2006 its total population is 46,777, out of which the population of Słubice is 17,199, that of Rzepin is 6,499, that of Ośno Lubuskie is 3,769, that of Cybinka is 2,668, and the rural population is 16,642. ==Neighbouring counties== Słubice County is bordered by [[Gorzów County]] to the north, [[Sulęcin County]] to the east and [[Krosno Odrzańskie County]] to the south. It also borders [[Brandenburg]] in Germany to the west. ==Administrative division== The county is subdivided into five [[gmina]]s (four urban-rural and one rural). These are listed in the following table, in descending order of population. {| width="60%" border="2" cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" style="font-size:90%;line-height:120%;" |-bgcolor="F0F8FF" | style="text-align:center;"|'''Gmina''' | style="text-align:center;"|'''Type''' | style="text-align:center;"|'''Area<br><small>(km²)</small>''' | style="text-align:center;"|'''Population<br><small>(2006)</small>''' | style="text-align:center;"|'''Seat''' |- |[[Gmina Słubice, Lubusz Voivodeship|Gmina Słubice]] |urban-rural | style="text-align:right;"|185.4 | style="text-align:right;"|19,726 |[[Słubice]] |- |[[Gmina Rzepin]] |urban-rural | style="text-align:right;"|191.1 | style="text-align:right;"|9,880 |[[Rzepin]] |- |[[Gmina Cybinka]] |urban-rural | style="text-align:right;"|279.7 | style="text-align:right;"|6,771 |[[Cybinka]] |- |[[Gmina Ośno Lubuskie]] |urban-rural | style="text-align:right;"|198.0 | style="text-align:right;"|6,304 |[[Ośno Lubuskie]] |- |[[Gmina Górzyca]] |rural | style="text-align:right;"|145.6 | style="text-align:right;"|4,096 |[[Górzyca, Lubusz Voivodeship|Górzyca]] |- |} ==References== *[http://www.stat.gov.pl/gus/45_655_PLK_HTML.htm Polish official population figures 2006] <br> {{Słubice County}} {{Lubusz Voivodeship}} [[Category:Słubice County| ]] [[Category:Land counties of Lubusz Voivodeship|Slubice]]
